solution_criteria: Provides 3500-4000 daily calories from plant-based sources
Includes minimum 90g protein from diverse plant proteins
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Test generating a meal plan for a vegan ultramarathon runner with specific dietary restrictions and high-calorie nutritional needs, emphasizing plant-based protein sources and endurance-optimized meal composition
